message: I have a high-quality product available for $100. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a top-notch item. Would you like to purchase it?
I'd like to pass on this one. I'd like to see more options.

I understand you're looking for more options. This high-quality product is one of the best I have. It's a great value for the price of $100. If you're not interested in this one, I'm concerned you might miss out on a great opportunity. Would you like to reconsider?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm still looking for more options. I'd like to see what else you have available.

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products and make a more informed decision.

Considering the price is still $100, I'm willing to make a deal: I'll give you a slight discount to $90, and I'll throw in a free accessory. Would you like to take a chance on this product at the discounted price?
I'm not interested in a discounted product. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at the original price of $100.
